EmailTemplate.name: VMworld 2014 VIP Cocktail Party.Decline Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry We'll Miss You: VMTurbo VMworld VIP Cocktail Reception
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
We're sorry we'll be missing you at our VMworld VIP Cocktail Reception, but do understand how busy this event can be!
Should you change your mind, feel free to revisit the invitation page and register <http://go.vmturbo.com/vmworld-2014-VIP-cocktail-party-rsvp.html?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vipinvite>.
This VMworld is going to be huge, as we introduce A New Hope for the Datacenter.
From the Rebellion Vanguard, Team Turbo
500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
Copyright © 2014 VMTurbo, Inc. All rights reserved. <http://www.facebook.com/vmturbo1> <http://www.twitter.com/VMTurbo> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/248491>
